titles: A most sweete and assured comfort for all those that are afflicted in consciscience [sic], or troubled in minde. Written by that godly & zealous preacher, M. Richard Greenham. With two comfortable letters to his especiall friends that way greeued.
author: Greenham, Richard.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Danter, for William Iones,
notes: Running title reads: A comfort for conscience.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
